outputs.output_descr: The objective of this project is to contribute to the Brazilian biodiversity conservation by means of its fauna and fish resources management and protection. Therefore, the project must provide the executing agency with the necessary technical support to carry out its actions through a decentralized approach. The project will achieve this through the following 4 Outcomes and their related Outputs: (i) to promote and deploy management tools and mechanisms for protection and management of fishery resources, (ii) empowering the general coordination mechanisms and Wildlife to promote management, conservation and management of fauna, (iii) to contribute to managing the use of fisheries resources and (iv) contribute to the conservation, protection, management and control of fauna.

The objective of this project is to contribute to the Brazilian biodiversity conservation by means of its fauna and fish resources management and protection.
